statements: UPDATE products SET product_price = 99.99, product_description = 'New description' WHERE product_id = 'ee4ddfe3-7473-4470-8ecc-4a013177fd12';

UPDATE products SET product_name = 'New Product Name', product_price = 49.99, production_date = '2022-10-15 15:30:00', blockchain_hash = 'abc123def456' WHERE product_id = '567e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
